scripts.dev: yarn prisma migrate deploy && yarn prisma generate && next dev --turbo
scripts.debug: yarn prisma migrate deploy && yarn prisma generate && next dev
scripts.start: yarn prisma migrate deploy && yarn prisma generate && next start
scripts.docker:basyx: docker compose -f compose.yml -f docker-compose/compose.dev.yml --profile basyx up
scripts.docker:dev: docker compose -f compose.yml -f docker-compose/compose.dev.yml --profile basyx --profile backend --profile frontend up
scripts.docker:backend: docker compose -f compose.yml -f docker-compose/compose.dev.yml --profile basyx --profile backend up
scripts.docker:test: docker compose -f compose.yml -f docker-compose/compose.test.yml --profile tests up -d --build && docker compose -f compose.yml -f docker-compose/compose.test.yml attach cypress-test
scripts.docker:stop: docker compose -f compose.yml -f docker-compose/compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose/compose.test.yml kill
scripts.docker:down: docker compose -f compose.yml -f docker-compose/compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose/compose.test.yml down
scripts.docker:prune: docker compose -f compose.yml -f docker-compose/compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose/compose.test.yml -f docker-compose/compose.keycloak.yml down -v && docker network prune && docker network rm mnestix-network
scripts.docker:keycloak: docker compose -f compose.yml -f docker-compose/compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose/compose.keycloak.yml up
scripts.docker:azure: docker compose -f compose.yml -f docker-compose/compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose/compose.azure_ad.yml up
